alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 22 at 3:20PM AKDT until April 24 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Windy. Blowing snow with low visibility over Elliot Highway summits. Winds gusting to 45 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Central Interior * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast winds gusting to 45 mph are expected to continue across most areas through Monday. This will cause blowing snow with low visibility over Elliot Highway Summits. Other areas will have drifting snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
